name: initialize_donation
attributes: # [doc = " 初回のみドネーションアカウントを初期化し、累計額を 0 にします。"]
body: let rec = & mut ctx . accounts . donation_record ;
rec . user = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;

name: donate
attributes: # [doc = " 署名者チェック済みユーザーが任意の額を寄付します（累計に加算）。"]
body: let rec = & mut ctx . accounts . donation_record ;
msg ! ("User {:?} donated {}, total now {}" , rec . user , amount , rec . total_donated) ;

name: view_total
attributes: # [doc = " 累計寄付額をログ出力します。"]
body: msg ! ("User {:?} total donated: {}" , rec . user , rec . total_donated) ;
